amendment.description: Amendment includes recreational vehicles as eligible under the Medium and Heavy Duty Commercial and Transit Vehicles research and development program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-255 to include recreational vehicles as eligible under the Medium and Heavy Duty Commercial and Transit Vehicles research and development program (sec. 201).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Donnelly (IN) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 369 - 62 (Roll no. 706).
